Docs.param: ID of the application. This is Application ID from the API Access settings blade in the Azure portal.
Optional. The timespan over which to query data. This is an ISO8601 time period value. This timespan is applied in addition to any that are specified in the query expression.
A list of Application IDs for cross-application queries.
Headers that will be added to request.
Docs.remarks: Executes an Analytics query for data. [Here](https://dev.applicationinsights.io/documentation/Using-the-API/Query) is an example for using POST with an Analytics query.
